channel.title: R on Shreyas Ragavan
channel.description: Recent content in R on Shreyas Ragavan

item.title: @Moderndive - An Introduction to Statistical and Data Sciences via R
item.description: Link to the book: http://moderndive.com glimpse() from dplyr seems to the be the same as str() Exploring data sets install.packages("nycflights13") library(nycflights13) library(dplyr) library(knitr) library(ggplot2) data(flights) using glimpse() and dplyr install.packages("nycflights13") library(nycflights13) library(dplyr) library(knitr) library(ggplot2) data(flights) glimpse(flights) using kable() with knitr install.packages("nycflights13") library(nycflights13) library(dplyr) library(knitr) library(ggplot2) data(flights) kable(flights) 3 Data viz using ggplot2 The Grammar of Graphics ggplo2 The various components of the Grammar of Graphics are specified in the ggplot function, which expects at a bare minimum as arguments: The data frame where the variables exist: the data argument The mapping of the variables to aesthetic attributes: the mapping argument, which specifies the aesthetic attributes involved

item.title: Edx - HarvardX PH125 1x Data Science R Basics
item.description: Resources Most of the instructor’s course contents from different courses is available in the book : <2018-02-04 Sun> Data scientist Toolbox : link <2018-02-04 Sun> R-Bloggers link <2018-02-04 Sun> Section 1: R Basics, Functions, Data types R was developed by statisticians and data analysts as an interactive environment for data analysis. It is not like C or Java. R is free and Open source. Runs on all major platforms.

item.title: On-line Certificate Course: EdX HarvardX PH125.1x: Data Science: R Basics
item.description: Verified EdX Certificate of Achievement The course covered an introduction to using R to extract, manipulate and thus analyse data. It basically lays the foundations to using R in data science. Course Notes and code Course exercises are linked with a Datacamp course. Data Science R basics

item.title: On-line Courses @ Datacamp
item.description: Links to certificates of courses completed on Datacamp Intro to SQL Data Science R basics. Completed as a part of EdX HarvardX PH125.1x: Data Science: R Basics
